channel.title: Joke class(OP) Add ways to make this overpowered
channel.description:
The Killer Passive-Can't touch this: Can't be lynched.
Passive-I can do what I want: Can have multiple passives (so we can add to this to make it op)
Passive-I hear you: Can hear all whispers
Passive-Eh I will die later: Can't die at all, Can't be redirected, Can't be occupied
Passive-So that's who you are-See's everyone current class.
Day ability 1-Get rekt- Choose someone to kill in front of everyone they will die instantly(Unlimited uses)
Day ability 2-Infinite troll box-Can use this as many times as they want
Day ability 3-No one shall be the king-Kills the current king, no kings may be elected in the future.
Day ability 4-HES EVILLLLL-Choose a person. They are instantly put on trial. Everyone is forced to vote execute.
Night ability one: No survivors-Kills someone Bypasses everything. (Unlimited uses)
Night ability two: Death to the empire's children- Kills all royal blooded people (Unlimited uses FOR THE LOLS)
Night ability three-No survivors-Kills all alchemists-
Add more suggestions on ways to improve this class.
